resources.string: GeoQuiz
1. Canberra is the capital of Australia.
2. The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
3. The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
4. The source of the Nile River is in Egypt.
5. The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas.
6. Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
True
False

1. The capital of Australia is not Sydney
2. There are more fish in the Pacific Ocean.
3. The Suez Canal Connects two seas.
4. Ask Omar Sharif for the answer.
5. You can buy many books on the Amazon website
6. Lake Baikal is located in Russia.
